entries.name: each(ubound = nil, generator = EratosthenesGenerator.new, &block)
entries.desc: Iterates the given block over all prime numbers.

entries.name: int_from_prime_division(pd)
entries.desc: Re-composes a prime factorization and returns the product.

entries.name: prime?(value, generator = Prime::Generator23.new)
entries.desc: Returns true if value is a prime number, else returns false.
